articles.author: Brian Truitt, USA TODAY
articles.title: Anthony Michael Hall didn't get a horror boost after '80s stardom. But it's here now in 'Halloween Kills' - USA TODAY
articles.description: 'Halloween' was one of the few seminal movies Anthony Michael Hall didn't star in back in the 80s, but he lends a 'scrappy' side to 'Halloween Kills.'
articles.content: Anthony Michael Hall may have starred in a bunch of seminal pop-culture classics, from the original “Vacation” to John Hughes’ most beloved works, but he missed out on the rise of the slasher movie i… [+4905 chars]
